details.desc: Created multi-platform control applications for 4K+ video wall processors. Ensured seamless performance across various devices and clients.
Developed cross-platform applications for iOS, web, Windows, Android, and Surface tablets. Ensured consistent quality and compatibility.
Crafted and implemented customized commands to enhance processor functionality.
Managed EVT (Event) messages across multiple instances, optimizing application performance.
Designed new application components, focusing on scalability and maintainability.
Proficient in working with RESTful APIs.
Committed to clean code, secure practices, and delivering high-quality software.

experiences.teckStack: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, MUI, Angular 14, Node, NPM ,NVM, NgRx, RxJs, EsLint, Cordova, Electron, HammerJs, HTML5, CSS/SASS, JSON/XML, Angular Material, Bootstrap, Jenkins, Perforce, GitHub, Python, Networking, IP/web sockets communication, Confluence,Jira etc.

details.desc: Involved in the development, maintenance, and testing of modular building blocks for operational support and goal achievement. Designed, developed, tested, and maintained responsive web applications, focusing on both frontend and backend technologies.
Collaborated with Highways England, CGI, and Kaptch. Developed the Charm interface software module as part of the CHARM Advanced Traffic Management System (ATMS).
Worked on developing new service level dashboards for the existing Assets and Faults Management System (AFMS).

Designed and developed a full-stack platform for generating free transactions. This platform was specifically designed for a Customer Communication Management (CCM) demonstration. It supported RESTful API calls.

Conducted research and POC work.  I explored various CCM systems, their components, and different tools available for implementation. As a result I was able to generate test data to simulate real-world transactions within the web-based system
